value.title: Deco.cx partnership, with HTML technology
value.paragraph: Bagaggio chose N1.AG to boost its digital strategy, achieving a +30% increase in performance with the migration to the deco.cx - HTMX platform. In this project, we applied all our expertise, bringing together innovation and further strengthening the brand's digital presence.üîíüíª

contentText.title: /About Bagaggio
contentText.description:
Founded in 1942 in Rio de Janeiro, Bagaggio has established itself as a benchmark brand in luggage and travel accessories in Brazil.

With more than 200 physical stores and a strong digital presence, Bagaggio is synonymous with tradition, quality and reliability. The brand is recognized for accompanying its customers on all their journeys, whether they are traveling or going about their daily lives.

cards.title: Front-end migration
cards.description: This strategy made it possible to measure the success of the new tool without external interference and accelerated the process, avoiding a redesign. The migration separated the user interface from the e-commerce back-end, maintaining the VTEXIO infrastructure and incorporating greater speed and flexibility.

cards.title: HTMX technology
cards.description: The adoption of HTMX technology was essential to simplify development and create light, interactive interfaces, minimizing the use of JavaScript. This has brought more agility and reduced site loading times, directly impacting the user experience.

cards.title: Collaborative management
cards.description: N1.AG worked collaboratively with Bagaggio throughout the process, applying its skills and tools to ensure that the project was delivered on time, meeting the client's expectations and demands.

textList.descriptionList: The adoption of HTMX made it easier to create interactive and lightweight interfaces, reducing dependence on JavaScript and focusing on improving project performance.
With the migration, Bagaggio achieved a PageSpeed score of 90+ points, a significant increase on previous scores.
We worked closely with Bagaggio, from conception to implementation, ensuring that each stage was completed efficiently and on time.
The migration to Deco.cx, which uses HTMX technology, resulted in significant improvements to the site's performance, loading speed and SEO, strengthening its potential for organic positioning.
